data.DESC - Description: Frost spells freeze the blood of their targets, halting Stamina regeneration for 5 seconds. If the targets are not resistant to frost, frost spells also reduce armor by 125 points for 5 seconds.
Sideways power attacks with a mace deplete all of your Stamina on impact, dealing 1% more damage per point of Stamina depleted and doing a critical strike.

Attacks with battle axes deal an additional 4 points of damage per second for 3 seconds to living targets. When the bleeding stops, they take damage equal to 30% of the Health they lost while bleeding.

Aetherius and Mundus once coexisted in both physical and magical planes, those who dominate the art of alteration to understand this fact, will channel Gleamstrike spells even further. (Increases damage from Gleamstrike and its spells).
Cast Novice level Destruction spells for half magicka. The damage of all Destruction spells scales with your skills up to 25%.
Increases False Light damage by 15% when you are affected by a shrine blessing.
Attacks with maces ignore 50% of armor.
Attacks with a dagger deal 50% more damage if you rapidly hit the target three or more times. Resets when 2 seconds pass between hits.

Your have familiarized yourself with the mechanics of your crossbow.
[+50% reload speed with crossbows],

You've become skilled in binding daedra in shape of weapons and armors. Bound weapons and armors are stronger longer-lasting, and easier to cast.
[stronger bound items, 1.25x bound spell duration, 0.5x bound weapon spell cost],
Werebeast Howl of Brotherhood calls Ice Wolves or Snow Bears instead.
Able to create a variety of beneficial Potions from Human Flesh or Human Hearts at a cooking pot.
Bows and crossbows do 50% more damage, and critical strikes with bows and crossbows do 2% more critical damage per level of Archery.

Your understanding of enchantments allow you to use them more effectively and efficiently.
[Staves and Scrolls are 10% more powerful, enchantments cost 10% less charges],
All spells are more effective against undead.

After some training at the shooting range you can deal more damage with bows and crossbows.
[20% more damage, ammunition grants armor penetration],
Every fifth Dwarven Autocannon shot is an electromagnetic blast that moves slower than a regular shell but deals shock damage to Health and Magicka equal to 240% of your Smithing skill level.
Mist Raven Handler.
Raising your hands (to draw a weapon or spell) places a Rallying Standard at your location for 120 seconds. This does not count against the limit of one Rallying Standard at a time.

Enemies are set on fire for extended duration, taking extra damage over time.
[extra damage over time for fire spells],

A dagger in your hand turns into a deadly weapon.
[3x irresistible sneak attack damage, +30% armor penetration],
Shock enchantments are 25% stronger.
Cast Apprentice level Destruction spells for half magicka.
After a successful Timed Block, bashing the attacker within 5 seconds deals double damage.

You can grapple opponents to disarm or immobilize them.
[unarmed power attacks stagger targets by 50% chance and disarm by 10% chance],
Scrolls are 6% more powerful or last 12% longer per level of Enchanting.

Your stomach has become otherwordly sturdy and now
allows you to even feast upon the flesh of more savage things.
Cast Novice level Destruction spells for half magicka. The damage of all Destruction spells scales with your skills up to 25%.
Cast Novice level Destruction spells for half magicka. The damage of all Destruction spells scales with your skills up to 25%.
Cast Novice level Destruction spells for half magicka. The damage of all Destruction spells scales with your skills up to 25%.
Able to turn into a Werebear.
Irresistible Dance now also forces daedra, undead and animals to listen spellbound.
Prices are higher in large cities than in small towns.
Allows feeding from corpses.
Cast Novice level Destruction spells for half magicka. The damage of all Destruction spells scales with your skills up to 25%.
Every 10 seconds, taking damage increases your Armor Rating by 150 for 6 seconds.
Deal 25% more attack damage in beast form.
Adds a +1 multiplier to melee sneak attacks and +0.5 multiplier to ranged sneak attacks. Unresistable sneak attack.

A dagger in your hand turns into a deadly weapon.
[55% irresistible sneak attack damage, +20% armor penetration],
Grants the "Spot Detection" power. At will, outlines all humanoids within 150 feet that are detecting you with a green glow. Lasts 30 seconds.
Toggle Enchantment use

After studying Arcane Craftsmanship, you've learned the
necessary techniques to craft bolts and arrows that will explode with elemental fury upon impact.
This perks applies additional armor rating against ranged attacks depending on the target's armor type.

You've taught yourself a few Novice level spells and learned how to cast them with decreased effort
while your newfound knowledge also allows you to augment all Alteration spells.
Cast Novice level Destruction spells for half magicka. The damage of all Destruction spells scales with your skills up to 25%.
Get better prices from spouses and lovers.

Your ice spells freeze even air in a trice
and make the harsh winters of Skyrim look like a refreshing breeze.

By distributing your weight more consciously,
you're able to avoid triggering pressure plates or similar mechanisms.
Dawnguard weapons do extra damage against vampires, and Dawnguard armor protects better against vampires.
Fire spells do 50% more damage.
Pickpocketing is 20% easier. Item weight and value reduce pickpocketing odds.
Cast Novice level Destruction spells for half magicka. The damage of all Destruction spells scales with your skills up to 25%.

You have discovered the art of aiming at tendons and joints.
[Chance to stagger targets, move forward and hold bash to perform power shot when over 200 stamina],

You've read The Armorer's Encyclopedia and know how to properly use all kinds of tools.
You now also understand the secondary material properties of Iron and Steel weapons.
Cast Novice level Destruction spells for half magicka. The damage of all Destruction spells scales with your skills up to 25%.
Attacks with greatswords reduce the target's attack damage by 25% for 3 seconds.
If you sleep in a coffin, you will gain additional power.
Cast Adept level Destruction spells for half magicka.
Feeding extends beast form for longer.

data.DESC - Description: Attacks with war axes cause extra bleeding damage.
Bows and crossbows deal up to 80% more damage to targets beyond 50 feet. The damage bonus increases as distance increases.
(0) Necrotic Cloak : Reduces melee damage taken from the living by 20%

Your studies of healing magic now grant you
the power of making yourself almost invulnerable for a short duration once a day.

Emotional illusion spells are improved with additional effects.
[improved effect for emotional spells],
